TopicTitle: [GAME!] Describe the person above you in one sentence

Articles.Content: This person does not seem to understand that you cannot have a decimal number of posts.
The person above is not aware that it is, in fact possible, but the method of doing so is so extremely convoluted that the forum system doesn\'t bother even counting it.
This person is quite smart and rational.
The person has code problems
The person above failed to place a punctuation mark at the end of his sentence, but all is forgiven.
This person enjoys Grammar Nazi-ing by the looks of his/her previous statement.
The person above has failed to read beyond the Grammar-Nazi section of my post, beyond which I stated 'but all is forgiven.'
The person above fails to notice that he meant to do single quotes, not double quotes.
This person is a true Grammar Nazi.
Person (and a few others) who is now involved in a discussion that has a slight chance of eventually leading to the actual discussion of Nazi Germany.
This person does not know it\'s going to be be when I mention that Adolf Hitler was actually a really good political leader.
The person above failed to realize that Godwin\'s Law was broken, even though it is not an official law.

The above person is unaware that the mere fact of mentioning 'Grammar Nazi' results in the completion of Godwin\'s Law, not the breaking.

(Continuing - In fact, any thread not mentioning Hitler or Nazi\'s is breaking Godwin\'s law.)
The above user is a Grammar Nazi
Instead of describing the above person, I have opted to ask the above person to explain how I am a Grammar Nazi for correcting misleading word choice.

You corre-

hmm

That\'s a hard one.

I guess you aren\'t
Steve5451 is a KSP forums user with an avatar picture, and a post count, as well as an avatar picture and a signature. Just like the rest of us.
Dogon11 either enjoys stating the patently obvious, or has no other thing to say in regards with Steve5451.
Radion Space Works is unique, just like the rest of us.
Dogon11 is unknown.
Lolnewb the rocketeer wants people to deal with it.
The person above doesn\'t care.
This person has no avatar... yet.
I worry about the kinds of buttons this guy might press.
I\'m worried about the above person\'s affinity towards ponies, especially his comment on being interested in anything pony-related.
